apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a man with a warm, medium skin tone enjoying a relaxing massage, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The gentle curve of his head and closed eyes, accented by subtle highlights, conveys a profound sense of peace and well-being. This emoji is perfectly suited for expressing relaxation, self-care, or the enjoyment of spa treatments, bringing a touch of tranquility to your digital conversations on Apple devices.
